verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: will] announce tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese products , the latest move in his campaign to rewrite the rules of global trade .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: announce] [ARG1: tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese products] , [ARGM-ADV: the latest move in his campaign to rewrite the rules of global trade] .
President Donald Trump will announce tariffs on $ 50 billion of Chinese products , the latest move in his campaign to [V: rewrite] [ARG1: the rules of global trade] .
